PLOT:

A sequel to The Bourne Supremacy and the third film of the Bourne Trilogy, it stars Matt 

Damon reprising his role as Ludlum\&#039;s signature character, amnesiac CIA assassin Jason 

Bourne. Julia Stiles, David Strathairn, Scott Glenn, Paddy Considine, Edgar Ramirez, 

Albert Finney, and Joan Allen co-star. The key cast members reprise their roles from the 

two previous Bourne movies, with additions such as Strathairn, playing a CIA department 

head; Considine as a British journalist; and Ramirez as a new assassin sent to kill 

Bourne. The film continues the saga of Jason Bourne after he apologizes to the daughter of 

Vladimir Neski in Moscow, Russia, and follows the character as he travels to Paris, 

London, Madrid, Tangier, and New York City to uncover his real identity, while the CIA 

continues to send assassins after him.
